display_html:
data Term
  • = Lam Pattern Type ScopedTerm
  • | Let Pattern Term ScopedTerm
  • | App Term Term
  • | Var VarIdent
  • | MetaVar MetaVarIdent [Term]
name: Term MetaVar Let Lam App Var

display_html: data MetaAppSig metavar scope term = MetaAppSig metavar [term]
name: MetaAppSig MetaAppSig

display_html: type SOAS (binder :: S -> S -> Type) metavar (sig :: Type -> Type -> Type) (n :: S) = AST binder (Sum sig (MetaAppSig metavar)) n
name: SOAS

display_html: type ScopedSOAS (binder :: S -> S -> Type) metavar (sig :: Type -> Type -> Type) (n :: S) = ScopedAST binder (Sum sig (MetaAppSig metavar)) n
name: ScopedSOAS

display_html: pattern MetaApp :: forall metavar binder (sig :: Type -> Type -> Type) n. metavar -> [SOAS binder metavar sig n] -> SOAS binder metavar sig n
name: MetaApp

display_html:
data MetaAbs (binder :: S -> S -> Type) (sig :: Type -> Type -> Type) t where
  • MetaAbs :: forall (n :: S) t (binder :: S -> S -> Type) (sig :: Type -> Type -> Type). NameBinderList 'VoidS n -> NameMap n t -> AST binder sig n -> MetaAbs binder sig t
name: MetaAbs MetaAbs

display_html:
newtype MetaSubst (binder :: S -> S -> Type) (sig :: Type -> Type -> Type) metavar (ext :: Type -> Type -> Type) t = MetaSubst {
  • getMetaSubst :: (metavar, MetaAbs binder (Sum sig ext) t)
}
name: MetaSubst getMetaSubst MetaSubst

display_html:
newtype MetaSubsts (binder :: S -> S -> Type) (sig :: Type -> Type -> Type) metavar (ext :: Type -> Type -> Type) t = MetaSubsts {
  • getMetaSubsts :: [MetaSubst binder sig metavar ext t]
}
name: MetaSubsts getMetaSubsts MetaSubsts

display_html: applyMetaSubsts :: forall (sig :: Type -> Type -> Type) metavar (n :: S) (binder :: S -> S -> Type) metavar' t. (Bifunctor sig, Eq metavar, Distinct n, CoSinkable binder, SinkableK binder) => (metavar -> metavar') -> Scope n -> MetaSubsts binder sig metavar (MetaAppSig metavar') t -> SOAS binder metavar sig n -> SOAS binder metavar' sig n
name: applyMetaSubsts

display_html: combineMetaSubsts :: forall metavar (sig :: Type -> Type -> Type) (ext :: Type -> Type -> Type) (binder :: S -> S -> Type) t. (Eq metavar, Bitraversable sig, Bitraversable ext, ZipMatchK (Sum sig ext), UnifiablePattern binder, SinkableK binder) => [MetaSubsts binder sig metavar ext t] -> [MetaSubsts binder sig metavar ext t]
name: combineMetaSubsts

display_html: match :: forall (sig :: Type -> Type -> Type) metavar (n :: S) (binder :: S -> S -> Type) (ext :: Type -> Type -> Type) t. (Bitraversable sig, ZipMatchK sig, Eq metavar, Distinct n, UnifiablePattern binder, SinkableK binder, Bitraversable ext, ZipMatchK (Sum sig ext)) => Scope n -> SOAS binder metavar sig n -> AST binder (Sum sig ext) n -> [MetaSubsts binder sig metavar ext t]
name: match

display_html: matchScoped :: forall (sig :: Type -> Type -> Type) (n :: S) metavar (binder :: S -> S -> Type) (ext :: Type -> Type -> Type) t. (Bitraversable sig, ZipMatchK sig, Distinct n, Eq metavar, UnifiablePattern binder, SinkableK binder, Bitraversable ext, ZipMatchK (Sum sig ext)) => Scope n -> ScopedSOAS binder metavar sig n -> ScopedAST binder (Sum sig ext) n -> [MetaSubsts binder sig metavar ext t]
name: matchScoped

display_html: matchMetavar :: forall metavar (n :: S) (m :: S) (binder :: S -> S -> Type) (sig :: Type -> Type -> Type) (ext :: Type -> Type -> Type) t. (Eq metavar, Distinct n, Distinct m, UnifiablePattern binder, SinkableK binder, Bitraversable sig, Bitraversable ext, ZipMatchK sig, ZipMatchK (Sum sig ext)) => Scope m -> NameBinderList 'VoidS m -> Scope n -> [SOAS binder metavar sig n] -> AST binder (Sum sig ext) n -> [(AST binder (Sum sig ext) m, MetaSubsts binder sig metavar ext t)]
name: matchMetavar

display_html: matchMetavarScoped :: forall (n :: S) (m :: S) metavar (binder :: S -> S -> Type) (sig :: Type -> Type -> Type) (ext :: Type -> Type -> Type) t. (Distinct n, Distinct m, Eq metavar, UnifiablePattern binder, Bitraversable sig, Bitraversable ext, ZipMatchK sig, ZipMatchK (Sum sig ext), SinkableK binder) => Scope m -> NameBinderList 'VoidS m -> Scope n -> [SOAS binder metavar sig n] -> ScopedAST binder (Sum sig ext) n -> [(ScopedAST binder (Sum sig ext) m, MetaSubsts binder sig metavar ext t)]
name: matchMetavarScoped
